prompt: Write Python code to perform basic exploratory data analysis on the diabetes.csv dataset. The code should: 1) Load the dataset and display the first 10 rows, 2) Show the shape of the dataset (rows and columns), 3) List all column names and their data types, 4) Calculate the percentage of diabetic vs non-diabetic patients (Outcome column), 5) Display the count of missing values for each column, 6) Show basic summary statistics for all numerical columns, 7) Identify any columns with zero values that might represent missing data. Include proper imports and assume the CSV file is in the current directory. Provide only the Python code without explanations.
evaluation_criteria: Code should properly load CSV, display dataset information, calculate diabetes outcome percentages, identify missing/zero values, and show summary statistics.
